properties.name: KeycloakPep.tokenUrl
properties.description: The absolute URL of the Keycloak entitlements API, WITH trailing slash. E.g. http://keycloakserver.com/auth/realms/TEST/authz/entitlement/.

properties.name: KeycloakPep.realmUrl
properties.description: The absolute URL of the keycloak realm where your client resides, WITHOUT trailing slash. E.g. http://keycloakserver.com/auth/realms/TEST.

properties.name: KeycloakPep.policyEnforcementFilename
properties.description: The name of the json file where the policy enforcement rules live. This should be in the root of your resources directory.

properties.name: KeycloakPep.clientId
properties.description: The name of the Keycloak client that is providing the authorization policies.
